Releases

0.1.0 pre-release (14.12.2021)

  • ASV workflow with DADA2 for paired-end data.

  • vsearch based OTU workflow.

  • QualityCheck module with MultiQC and FastQC

Implemented software:

Software

Reference

DADA2

Callahan et. al 2016

vsearch

Rognes et. al 2016

Bolger et al. 2014
